Material used.Description: Experiments were conducted using HEK293 cells transiently transfected with plasmids encoding wild-type or mutant SNCA proteins.

Readout description.Result Description: The A309G mutation significantly increased Î±-synuclein oligomerization and reduced membrane potential stability compared to wild-type, with 72% decreased current density.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated across three independent biological replicates.

Technical replicates.Description: Each biological replicate was tested in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SNCA-expressing cells served as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells served as negative controls.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-tailed Student's t-test with Bonferroni correction for multiple comparisons.
